title: Implement tsk update in Rust
description: Implement update command in Rust with all flags.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: implement tsk update in Rust mirroring Python. Acceptance: update title/description/status with workflow validation, missing issue error, apply closed_at side effects, step definitions already present.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Rust tsk update with workflow validation. Ran: cd rust && cargo test

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Rust issue update workflow, issue lookup helper, and wired CLI update command. Ran: cd rust && cargo test; python tools/check_spec_parity.py
